data.text: @stacycay The endemic phase is interesting from an evolutionary perspective. As I understand it, typically it isn't selectively beneficial for viruses to kill their hosts. A dead host is not nearly as good at transmitting a virus as a living host.
@stacycay Does someone have the "let's fucking go" picture?
@stacycay Everything is trending in the right ▶️ direction and nearing the end 🔚 of this but if we stay vaccinated boosted, we could end 🔚 this pandemic but we need to stay alert
@stacycay Does this mean the Pandemic is coming to an end 🔚 really 🔜?

@Transgirlkatie2 I mean it won’t be. It’ll be like the flu is now where new strains constantly coming out and some are worse than others

But I think the worst days are most likely over
@stacycay This is so good news, I hope this is the last major surge
@stacycay @DecolonizeKant I'd say it depends where you live. I'm from California and even in orange county most people still wore masks. But in places like Florida most people weren't wearing them
@DecolonizeKant @stacycay If it makes you feel better, I have three doses, had Covid in January (meaning immunity), and I still wear a mask.
